descriptions: The student shows no awareness of different contexts and makes no effort to adjust their speech.
The student shows minimal awareness of different contexts, with only slight adjustments made to their speech.
The student attempts to adjust their speech to different contexts, but the adjustments are inconsistent or not always appropriate.
The student generally adapts their speech to different contexts with reasonable appropriateness.
The student effectively adapts their speech to different contexts, demonstrating a strong awareness of audience and purpose.
The student skillfully adapts their speech to a variety of contexts, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of audience, purpose, and situation, enhancing communication effectively.
The student's speech lacks command of formal English, with frequent errors in grammar, vocabulary, and style, regardless of the indicated context.
The student demonstrates a limited command of formal English, with noticeable errors in grammar, vocabulary, and style even when formal English is indicated.
The student attempts to use formal English when indicated, but struggles with consistency, showing some errors in grammar, vocabulary, and style.
The student generally uses formal English appropriately when indicated, with few errors in grammar, vocabulary, and style.
The student demonstrates a strong command of formal English when indicated, using correct grammar, sophisticated vocabulary, and appropriate style effectively.
The student demonstrates an exceptional command of formal English, using it skillfully and precisely to enhance communication and convey meaning effectively, adapting style with finesse.
The student's speech is unclear and lacks coherence, making it difficult to understand the message.
The student's speech is somewhat unclear and lacks consistent coherence, hindering the understanding of the message.
The student attempts to speak clearly and coherently, but struggles with organization and logical flow.
The student generally speaks clearly and coherently, with a reasonable level of organization and logical flow.
The student speaks clearly and coherently, presenting ideas in a well-organized and logical manner.
The student speaks with exceptional clarity and coherence, presenting ideas in a highly organized, logical, and engaging manner that captivates the audience.
